name: 劉宛育
objective:
表現法工具與應用。

The course will introduce basic skills and applications of traditional and digital tools utilized for architectural presentation.
schedule:
week01 2/22: Introduction
week02 3/01: (校慶補假)
week03 3/08: Drawings 
week04 3/15: Photoshop I
week05 3/22: Photoshop II
week06 3/29: Review I
week07 4/05: (清明連假)
week08 4/12: Models
week09 4/19: 期中考週
week10 4/26: Review II
week11 5/03: Sketchup I
week12 5/10: Sketchup II
week13 5/17: (新一代設計展)
week14 5/24: Review III
week15 5/31: InDesign I
week16 6/07: InDesign II
week17 6/14: Presentation
week18 6/21: 期末考週
